name: AzureFunctionAppContainerDeployment
description: Utilizes azure-cli to push a container image to an azure function app, and optionally verifys the deployment by checking a url for a version tag
author: Jarlotee

inputs.name: azureResourceManagerConnection
inputs.label: Azure Resource Manager Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Resource Manager Connection for the deployment

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group containing your function app

inputs.name: functionAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the function app

inputs.name: slot
inputs.label: Deployment Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the function app

inputs.name: containerRegistry
inputs.label: Container registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry service connection. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag to be used on the release

inputs.name: versionVerificationPath
inputs.label: Version Verification Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to an endpoint that adverstises the application version, to confirm deployment success

inputs.name: healthVerificationPath
inputs.label: Health Verification Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to an endpoint that adverstises the application health, to confirm deployment success
